mapper.select: select sum(od.SHOPPINGNUM) shopnumber, gd.id id, gd.GNAME gname, gd.GOPRICE goprice, gd.GRPRICE grprice, gd.GPICTURE gpicture from GOODSTABLE gd LEFT JOIN ORDERDETAIL od ON od.goodstable_id=gd.id group by gd.id, gd.GNAME, gd.GOPRICE, gd.GRPRICE, gd.GPICTURE order by shopnumber desc limit 10

select count(ft.goodstable_id) fn, gt.id id, gt.gname gname, gt.grprice grprice, gt.gpicture gpicture from GOODSTABLE gt LEFT JOIN FOCUSTABLE ft ON ft.goodstable_id=gt.id group by gt.id, gt.gname, gt.grprice, gt.gpicture order by fn desc limit 10
select * from noticetable order by ntime desc
select gt.*,gy.typename from goodstable gt,goodstype gy where gt.id=#{id} and gt.goodstype_id = gy.id
select gt.*, gy.typename from GOODSTABLE gt,GOODSTYPE gy where gt.goodstype_id = gy.id and gt.gname like concat('%',#{mykey},'%')
